156.sentence: This camera is great, wonderfully small, and has attactive hi-tech casing.

157.sentence: Very easy to use for someone like me who's just hopping on the digital camera bandwagon.

158.sentence: The controls are easy to understand and big enough that they are easy to see and use.

159.sentence: The optical and digital zooms combine to give an effective 4x zoom.

160.sentence: This is enough capacity and capability to do a complete household inventory, for example.

161.sentence: So, why the small Digital Elph, rather than one of the other cameras with better resolution or picture quality? size[+2

162.sentence: After getting one for Christmas from Amazon, I'm now a believer:  The Digital Elph is truly the world's smallest digital camera that shoots great pictures.

163.sentence: I've had this camera just over 2 years and it takes pretty good pictures.

164.sentence: The size is tiny, which I love.

165.sentence: Sometimes the pictures are onthe dark side, but I'm able to fix that using the Photoshop 6.0 "adjust levels" function ... not sure how a person would do that without Photoshop, though.

166.sentence: This camera is so easy to use!

167.sentence: All the features are incredibly intuitive, even for a novice like me.

168.sentence: The pictures are beautiful, and the camera is so small you can carry it anywhere.

169.sentence: I, as many others, have waited for many years for the convergence of price, features, size and ease of use to hit that happy center point.

170.sentence: I bought this little guy a few weeks back, and I have to saythat I never had so much fun with a new toy as this.

171.sentence: You willdefinitly appreciate the small size.
